function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low response rate to the survey","Impact":"Potential selection bias and unreliable data","Mitigation":"Using additional data sources to validate and cross-reference findings","Technologies":"Data validation and cross-referencing tools","People":"Survey respondents, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Inequalities in response rates based on gender, age, education, marital status, employment, immigration status, and income","Impact":"Risk of biased and unrepresentative data","Mitigation":"Implementing weighted analysis to account for demographics, using multi-channel survey approaches","Technologies":"Survey weighting tools, multi-channel survey software","People":"Survey respondents, data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Data analysts, researchers"},{"Description":"The interplay between individual, community, and societal factors in promoting mental health and well-being","Impact":"Complex and interconnected influence on mental health","Mitigation":"Implementing holistic and multi-level interventions, addressing social determinants of health","Technologies":"Health data analytics, community health intervention tools","People":"Healthcare providers, community leaders, policymakers","Owner":"Policymakers, healthcare organizations"}]}
